SELECT P1.PD_CD , P2.PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P1 /*상품각사속성상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '5' /* 5: 필터 */ /* 상품그룹 */
AND (CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(P1.PD_PRP_VAL01,2,1) ELSE P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 END) = ${pdGrpCd} /* 상품그룹 */

WITH PART_INF AS ( /*품목정보*/ SELECT P1.PD_CD , P2.SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ , P2.PD_NM /*품목명*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL06 AS AS_LDTM /*리드타임, AS_LDTM*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL17 AS AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD /*자재관리유형, AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD, MAT_MNGT_DV_CD */ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS AS_MAT_CMN_CLSF_CD /*AS자재 공통분류, AS_MAT_CMN_CLSF_CD, CMN_PART_DV_CD*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL30 AS TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN /*회전율 대상여부, TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL07 AS MIN_GO_QTY /*최소발주량, MIN_GO_QTY*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL32 AS UI_EXPSR_YN /*사용여부*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL36 AS SV_MAT_GRP_CD /*서비스자재그룹 A 일반, B 설치, C 필터, D 피팅/폼, E 중수리, F 소모품, G 공구*/ , (CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(P1.PD_PRP_VAL01,2,1) ELSE P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 END) AS AS_MAT_ITM_GRP_CD /*PD_GRP_CD AS자재 품목그룹*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL26 AS AS_SPL_UNIT_AMT /*물류의 공급단가(물류 매각시 사용단가)*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 || P1.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS KIWI_PD_CD , P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS AS_MAT_ITM_KND_CD FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P1 /*상품각사속성상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' /*상품유형코드 : C 복합상품, P 기준상품, S 서비스, M 교재제품, Y 융합상품*/ AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '5' /* 5: 필터 AS자재 품목종류, AS_MAT_ITM_KND_CD, ITM_KND_CD*/
AND (CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(P1.PD_PRP_VAL01,2,1) ELSE P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 END) = ${pdGrpCd} /* 상품그룹 */
/* AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 || P1.PD_PRP_VAL31= '42802000000' */ ) , OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF AS ( /* 조직 및 창고 */ SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O1.OG_ID , O1.OG_TP_CD , O1.OG_CD , O1.OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN 'Wells CS운영팀' ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM , O1.HGR_OG_ID , S1.WARE_NO , S1.WARE_NM , S1.WARE_USE_YN , S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD , S1.WARE_DV_CD , S1.HGR_WARE_NO , S1.STD_WARE_USE_YN /*표준창고사용여부*/ , O2.PRTNR_NO , O2.PRTNR_KNM , O2.FST_CNTR_DT /*최초계약일자*/ , O2.FNL_CLTN_DT /*최종해약일자*/ , O2.RCNTR_DT /*재계약일자*/ , O2.CLTN_DT /*해약일자*/ , O2.CNTR_DT /*계약일자*/ , O2.BZ_STAT_CD /*사업상태코드, 1 사업, 2 해약, 3 휴업*/ , O2.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , O2.RSB_DV_CD /*직책구분코드*/ , O2.ROL_DV_CD /*직무구분코드*/ , O2.PRTNR_GD_CD /*파트너등급코드*/ , O2.QLF_DV_CD /*자격구분코드*/ , O2.PERF_EXCD_OJ_YN /*실적제외대상여부*/ , O2.RDS_DSB_EXCD_OJ_YN /*RDS지급제외대상여부*/ , COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY HGR_OG_ID ORDER BY HGR_OG_ID) AS HTR_CNT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID /* AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD LIKE '2%' */ /* AND S1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' */ /*미사용창고에서 반품 되는 경우도 있기 때문에*/ AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 /*월파트너내역*/ ON S1.APY_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND S1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND S1.OG_ID = O2.OG_ID AND S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO
AND O2.CLTN_DT IS NULL /* 퇴사자 제외 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{startDt},1,6) /* 조직 검색조건 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') /* 매니저 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') /* 엔지니어 */
AND O1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} /* 총괄단조건(1차레벨조직코드) */
AND O1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} /* 지역단조건(2차레벨조직코드)*/
AND O1.DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr3LevlOgId} /* 지점조건(3차레벨조직코드)*/
AND O1.OG_ID = #{ogId} /* 서비스센터 */
AND O2.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /* 엔지니어/매니저 파트너번호 */
ORDER BY O1.BASE_YM, O1.OG_CD ) SELECT /*+ INDEX(S1 IX_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ_01) */ DISTINCT W1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , W1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , W1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM , W1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID , W1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , W1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM , W1.DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID , W1.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD , W1.DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM , W1.PRTNR_NO , W1.PRTNR_KNM , W1.WARE_NO , W1.WARE_NM , LISTAGG(S1.ITM_PD_CD ||'_' || SUM(S1.USE_QTY) , ',') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY S1.ITM_PD_CD) OVER ( PARTITION BY W1.WARE_NO) AS PD_CDS FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ S1 /*서비스작업출고내역, ST163TB*/ INNER JOIN OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF W1 ON S1.WK_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO INNER JOIN PART_INF P1 ON S1.ITM_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD != '6' AND S1.USE_QTY > 0
AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = #{svBizHclsfCd} /* 업무유형 */
AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND FNL_VST_FSH_DT BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} GROUP BY W1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , W1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , W1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM , W1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID , W1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , W1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM , W1.DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID , W1.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD , W1.DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM , W1.PRTNR_NO , W1.PRTNR_KNM , W1.WARE_NO , W1.WARE_NM , S1.ITM_PD_CD
